title: Riding on air
creator_credit: Central Office of Information for Foreign Office and Colonial Office and Editorial Film Productions
brief_description: Britain’s bicycle manufacturing industry and the popularity of cycling in Britain. Forerunners of the modern bicycle; the manufacture of bicycles; and annual cross country cycle race and the International Cycle Rally. No other credits available.
